lines.text: n , m , k , cnt = integers with cnt = 0 and a = array of 105 integers
lines.code: int n , m , k , cnt = 0 , arr [ 105 ] ;

lines.text: Read n values into array arr
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { cin >> arr [ i ] ; }
for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: if arr [ i ] is less than or equal to k
print cnt and a new line
for j = n - 1 to m exclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = n - 1 ; j >= m ; j -- )

lines.text: if arr [ i ] is less than or equal to k
print cnt and a new line
